title: An app designed for well-being.
subtitle: Enjoy personalized services for your four-legged companion: sitting, walking, training, and much more.

dogsitter.title: Dog Sitter
dogsitter.text: With our app, easily find jobs near you to take care of adorable dogs.

dogtrainer.title: Dog Trainer
dogtrainer.text: Training a dog can be challenging. Trust our certified experts to help with the learning process.

vet.title: Veterinary Services

activity.title: Activities and Leisure
